name: churchtools
title: ChurchTools
description:
ChurchTools is a management software for christian churches.
This plugin interacts with the quick search of ChurchTools.
author: niklasarnitz

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search ChurchTools
commands.description: Uses the Quicksearch of ChurchTools to search your ChurchTools instance

preferences.title: ChurchTools URL
preferences.description: The full hostname of your ChurchTools instance
preferences.name: instanceUrl

preferences.title: Login Token
preferences.description: The login token of the user you want to use
preferences.name: loginToken

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
